title: MCS Countryside Arched Windowpane Wall Mirror, White 30 x 44 in
features: The 2 inch wide frame showcases this mirror's elegant windowpane design featuring a distressed white finish
The mirror's outside dimensions measure 30x44 inches
The White Farmhouse Windowpane Wall Mirror's mirrored surface measures 27.6x41.6 inches
The back of the mirror features 2 pre-attached D-ring hangers for vertical hanging
The windowpane frame is constructed of MDF and the mirror is glass
description: The MCS Countryside Arched Windowpane Wall Mirror is a stunning accent mirror inspired by historic Gothic architecture. This enchanting mirror is the perfect accent for any room in your home. The white finish creates a simple yet elegant look. The finish features a distressed look to give this mirror the feel of a timeless heirloom. Perfect as a centerpiece over a fireplace mantel, entryway or statement wall.
